snippet.title: Duck Life Adventure - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Duck Life is back and bigger than ever! Design your own duck and embark on a epic adventure. Explore an enormous new area to find training dojos, shops and ducks to race and battle. Play 16 new training games to level up your duck in 8 skills and become the greatest duck adventurer ever!

Out now! Get it here:
PC/Mac: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1321270/Duck_Life_Adventure
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/duck-life-adventure/id1520736876
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.uk.wixgames.ducklifeadventure

Coming soon on Nintendo Switch and Xbox One!
